oldentry: Popular explanation: an orb rising above the horizon.
verblex: 1. Of the sun or moon, to appear from below the horizon. English = rise.
2. Of the sky, to begin to grow light after the night. English = dawn.
nomlex: 1. The time in the morning when the sky begins to grow light and then the sun first appears in the sky. English = sunrise, dawn, daybreak.
2. The colours and light that you see in the eastern part of the sky when the sun first appears. English = sunrise.
